title: Private room in guesthouse in Kecamatan Kuta, Indonesia
description:
## About this space

✦ Enjoy a bathtub in a private garden of your own room!

Our SPA Room is a delight! Privacy and comfort in the best location. Be sure to relax in the end of the day with a proper bubble bath and big bed… or request a in-room massage with our house specialists.

Booking this room grants access to all facilities in the house; like our pool area or secret gardens. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen or a short walk to the beach, only a minute walk away…
otherRules: If you come at night between 9 PM till 6 AM we can arrange that someone checks you in for an additional fee of 15 USD.
